title: RHOM: Oh, Well, You Know Peter...
description: On the second episode of Real Housewives of Miami season 4, we are reintroduced to Alexia's disaster of a son, Peter, who refuses to walk her down the aisle for her wedding and may have contributed to his brother's latest medical emergency. Great! Also, there's a lady wearing a table at a sushi party.
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
